name: KinshipStories
description:
Join us on the quest for knowledge!

Based on cutting edge DNA research and data science we have created an AI that brings back memories from the past. 

What can you do?

We have a lot of data and need your help to sort everything out.

Help us to find the biological links and marital status of all people. Our DNA Lab will be able to check the data. Feel free to send them your findings. But it can take times to run all the tests.

Chat with those people from the past to find the correct links.
